event.title: the 1950s, Bellevue was a small community which existed

data.event: In the 1950s, Bellevue was a small community which existed primarily to serve the needs of nearby farms.

event.title: changed the designation of the office there from "Bellview, Tennessee" to a branch of the Nashville office in the late 1970s

data.event: The suburbanization was made official when the United States Postal Service changed the designation of the office there from "Bellview, Tennessee" to a branch of the Nashville office in the late 1970s.

event.title: population and development in the already established areas along Old Hickory, and now

data.event: Since the year 2000, Bellevue has grown in population and development in the already established areas along Old Hickory, and now it is becoming progressively more lit.
